reviewText: Robson Green makes fishing fun and exciting.  I only watched because of him, having exhausted every movie and series he's been in, and it doesn't at all  hurt that he's so charming and handsome, but I really enjoyed these shows.
Only region 1 will play in the US and Canada. Too bad the seller doesn't tell you that. This one is probably a region 2 (Europe) DVD.
after receiving it, the DVD would not play at all! =(  disappointed.
